page.title: 14A LARGE FARM ON BREDON HILL
page.content: Overbury Estate belongs to the Holland Martin family.It is divided into 2 large farms called Vale Farm and Hill Farm.Hill Farm is 1000 acres and seven people work there.Vale Farm is 1000 acres and 7 people work there.On Hill Farm there are 900 sheep and 200 cattle.A lot of the land is used for growing crops.Vale Farm has 127 cattle but no other animals. Both farms have Ford and Renault tractors, these are replaced about every four years and cost from eighteen to twenty thousand pounds.There are also several combine harvesters which cost even more. The people who work on the farms work 40 hours a week.At harvest time work can continue from 6a.m. until 10 p.m. Some of the crops grown are barley, wheat, oil seed rape,linseed, sweetcorn and sugar beet.
